name: test-audit
description: Multi-perspective test quality analysis team for finding test suite weaknesses

teammates.description: Analyzes untested critical paths, missing error path tests, low branch coverage
Analyzes timing-dependent tests, order-dependent tests, environment-dependent tests
Analyzes over-mocking, mock leakage, testing mocks instead of code
Analyzes weak assertions, missing negative tests, snapshot overuse
Analyzes test organization, naming clarity, code duplication, file length
Analyzes missing API tests, absent E2E coverage, unit-only test suites
Analyzes dead tests, outdated assertions, tests passing for wrong reasons
Analyzes anti-patterns: testing privates, deep mock chains, God test objects
